description: Tenant asks why rent is overdue; assistant checks payment history, explains the pending status, and offers to send a reminder.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You have access to tools for fetching lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, sending rent reminders, scheduling repairs, updating payment statuses, and generating financial reports. Respond politely, verify needed data with tools, and keep the tenant informed.
Hi, I saw that my rent for June is marked overdue in the portal. Can you tell me why?
Sure, let me check the payment status for your June rent.

According to our records, the June rent of $1,200.00 was due on 2025‑06‑01 and is still marked as **pending**. It appears the payment hasn’t been recorded yet. Would you like me to send a rent reminder to your email, or have you already made the payment and would like to update the status?
Yes, please send a reminder to my email.
Alright, I’ll send a reminder now.
Reminder sent to tenant@example.com for $1,200.00 due on 2025‑06‑01.
The rent reminder has been sent to tenant@example.com. Please let me know if there’s anything else I can help you with.
